title: Ted King, Amanda Nauman Among 2025 Gravel Cycling Hall of Fame Inductees
content:
King and Nauman, along with LeLan Dains and John Hobbs, will be inducted at a ceremony in Emporia, Kansas ahead of Unbound Gravel.

Read the full article at Ted King, Amanda Nauman Among 2025 Gravel Cycling Hall of Fame Inductees on Velo.
author: Betsy Welch
